conditions.title: General
conditions.description: If a customer changes their mind before the tour date, they may request a refund. Refund amount depends on how far in advance the cancellation is made. No refunds for cancellations made within 24 hours of the tour start time.

conditions.title: General
conditions.description: If the customer has a scheduling conflict that prevents attendance, they may request a refund or reschedule. Refund amount depends on notice given. Rescheduling may be offered as an alternative.

conditions.title: General
conditions.description: If the tour is cancelled due to weather or safety concerns by the operator, a full refund or reschedule will be offered. Customer-initiated cancellations due to weather forecasts follow standard cancellation terms.

conditions.title: General
conditions.description: If the tour is cancelled by the operator for any reason, customers will receive a full refund or the option to reschedule at no additional cost.

conditions.title: General
conditions.description: In case of documented medical emergency or bereavement, customers may request a full refund or reschedule regardless of standard cancellation terms. Documentation may be required.

conditions.title: General
conditions.description: If the tour experience significantly differs from the description provided, customers may request a partial or full refund. Claims must be made within 48 hours of tour completion with supporting details.
